lead_paragraph: As speculation swirled that the Murdoch family had decided Roger Ailes must leave, the company issued a statement that the matter was “not yet resolved.”

byline.contributor: Brooks Barnes contributed from Los Angeles, John Koblin from New York and Michael M. Grynbaum from Cleveland.

headline.print_headline: Fox Says  Ailes’s Fate Remains in Review
headline.main: Fox News’s Convention Moment Overshadowed by Struggle Over Ailes’s Fate

snippet: As speculation swirled that the Murdoch family had decided Roger Ailes must leave, the company issued a statement that the matter was “not yet resolved.”...
abstract: Fox News Channel says it is reviewing whether chairman Roger Ailes will stay in job after lawsuit by former anchor Gretchen Carlson alleging sexual harassment; there seems to be struggle within Fox and owner 21st Century Fox over his fate.
